text:
The final day of Orient City's big summer event,
"Hero City Summer Festa"-

Tsuneaki, having finished his mission early,
reclines on a deck chair,
gazing at the visitors in the beach area.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not at all!
This old man can wait for you indefinitely, so don't worry, [Player]-kun.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so?
It's much better than arriving at the last minute and making you wait outdoors in the summer, [Player]-kun.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
-Hi there, [Player]-kun.
I'm enjoying my vacation in
Orient City ahead of you.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
We've both finally been released from work,
so let's spend today relaxing by the sea, shall we?
Right, doesn't that sound good?

options.text: I'm worried about the remaining work...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright, alright, don't worry about that!
Leave the rest to your seniors or your future self, and let's just think about having fun with me today, okay?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Alright, it's settled.
Today, you and this old man will enjoy
the beach area's events and activities to the fullest!

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Oh~ an idol concert on the beach, huh?
As expected, NeoTalents are outstanding
when it comes to captivating the audience.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
-Yes, that's right.
Thanks to the efforts of Kouki-kun and the heroes from that agency, the customers' hearts must have been greatly soothed.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Several times for public work.
Most of the recordings were in Kyoto, but all the talents were wonderful!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, you like idols that much-
Y-you even brought your own penlight!?
But it's daytime now, so you can't use it, can you?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Oh, this is delicious!
Honestly, I didn't expect much, but
you can't underestimate the food at the beach house, can you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh?
[Player]-kun, are you actually in love with Orient City?
That line sounds like me introducing Shinraku.

options.text: You probably don't usually eat this kind of food.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Do you think I only go to fancy and expensive restaurants?
That's not true!
This old man's daily life is quite simple.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahaha, [Player]-kun, you must have been hungry?
Look, you've got sauce on your cheek.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
After a break, let's move a little.
Oh, I don't mean swimming. There are many
other ways to enjoy the sea, aren't there?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
That's right, move the paddle like that-
You're good~!
Have you ever done SUP boarding before?

note:
SUP stands for Stand Up Paddleboard.
Think of it like a traditional surfboard,
but you also hold a paddle along with it.

options.text: Tsuneaki-san, you are a good teacher.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, [Player]-kun, you say such nice things.
This old man might get carried away~?

options.text: Don't talk to me... I'm about to fall into the sea.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa!? Calm down, it's okay.
I'm supporting you, so let's slowly regain your balance.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Hey [Player]-kun. How about we go to
that floating attraction in the sea
after this?

options.text: I feel like that's for kids...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There are families and couples there, you know?
It seems adults can enjoy it too.
Let's return to our childlike innocence!

options.text: Should I "accidentally" drop you into the sea?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That would cease to be an accident if I say it now, wouldn't it!?
Oh, I see, you're expecting this old man to say the classic "Don't push me!" line, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you play around and fall into the sea in places like this, you'll get severely scolded.
This old man is too old for that, so I'd rather not!

name: Tsuneaki
text:
...Still, spending time with someone else
like this isn't bad at all.
It's different from a vacation spent alone.

Having thoroughly enjoyed marine leisure,
[Player] and Tsuneaki walked side by side on the beach area's sand.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Oh, I really enjoyed myself.
It's been a while since I could spend
my vacation with such a calm heart.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
When I first came to Hero Festa,
I was worried about what would happen...
But in the end, it turned out pretty well.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
And the Mr. Bureaucrat agreed to cover for me,
so for now, I can probably return to my original work
without much worry.

options.text: I see, when this is over-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'll return to the "agency" once this is over, but I'll probably head to another "business trip location" when the time is right.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you talking about!
Your job isn't easy either, is it?
We're both in the same boat.

options.text: (Looks at him with a sad face)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Now, don't give me that face.
This was a coincidence, but the day
we meet again will surely come.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
...That's right, [Player]-kun.
Could you please transform me
into that form again?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, not that one!
It's the form that you
properly observed, alright!?

text:
As [Player] operates the device,
Tsuneaki's body is enveloped in red light
and changes into the form of a "rookie hero".

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
...Thank you. This form that only you show me,
though it is certainly my potential,
it is just like a temporary dream or illusion.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
However, even if it is fleeting,
it is a memory I want to cherish.
Just as much as the dream-like days I spent with you.

options.text: Let's go to the sea together again.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
...You say such things so casually.
Don't you know how heavily your words
resonate in my heart?

Tsuneaki takes a big step forward,
closing the distance with [Player].

He takes off his hero suit jacket,
and even removes the mask he usually wears,
confessing his true feelings that he had kept hidden.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
How happy I was to reunite with you by chance.
How enjoyable and irreplaceable it was
to do hero activities with you.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
I don't want these summer days to end.
[Player]... if possible,
I want to take you away right now.

It was far from flirtatious, sweet-sounding words;
it was a direct and unadorned voice from the heart.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
-I know, this isn't the time for that.
At least not until I achieve my own objective.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haa... it's not good.
Even if you're fine, I'm not.
I can't do such a thing halfway through my goal.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You, how much do you intend to see through me?
Sometimes, looking into your eyes frightens me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that's right, it's not the time to welcome you.
At least not until I achieve my own objective.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
You in Kyoto,
made me remember
the kindness of others.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
And in this sea,
you let me play an active role
as a proper hero.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
You illuminate and show me the path
I couldn't find alone.
That is who you are to me, [Player].

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
To fulfill that person's wish,
my strength alone isn't enough.
You compensate for that.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
Yet, to try and take away such a precious person
due to my own temporary sentimentality...
I'm sorry. I lost myself.

The distance remains closed, but his voice
returns to a soft and calm tone.

Tsuneaki recalls his own position.
No matter what the person in front of him says, he must tell himself
that these summer days were a dream.

Even for the current Tsuneaki, who understands
that human connections can become strength, not weakness.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
I'll continue to watch over you
from afar, as always.
So, please don't be reckless from now on too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Truly, thank you, [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Pledging to meet again, huh... haha.
It's a small thing, but sharing a dream with someone is a good feeling.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right-
Ah, I'm thinking of the same thing too.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
This form that you observed
gives me courage.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
That I can be anything,
that I can face any difficulty.

name: Tsuneaki (Rookies)
text:
[Player].
I will never forget the
potential you observed of me, ever.

The long silhouette cast on the sandy beach
of the beach area, dyed in the sunset,
overlaps into one. Leaving behind an unforgettable memory-
